pages.title: Spell Scrolls
pages.text: $(br)The spells you can learn from the $(mage/bind)Spell Binding Table$() are limited. To learn and use more magic, you need $(key)spell scrolls$().$(br2)$(welcome/emi#search)Search$() for $(copy:spell scroll)spell scroll$() and $(welcome/emi#ru)check uses$() to see how to obtain them.

$(br)$(key)Spell scrolls$() can be used directly for $(mage/cast)casting$(), and can also be freely $(bold)bound$() to or $(bold)unbound$() from $(mage/book)spell books$(). $(key)Spell scrolls$() are usually obtained via $(mage/infusion)Enchantment Infusion$() with specific materials.
